Reason: The configuration option 'memtable_offheap_space_in_mb' is performance-sensitive. This is because the value of 'memtable_offheap_space_in_mb' directly impacts the off-heap memory limit for memtables in the createMemtableAllocatorPool method. The off-heap memory limit is a crucial factor in memory management and can significantly affect system performance, especially in scenarios where memory-intensive operations are involved. Therefore, any changes to 'memtable_offheap_space_in_mb' can lead to notable performance variations at the system level.
